    • executeOption

      public void executeOption(int option)
      This method execute the user's option in the menu
      Parameters:
      option - user's option

    • initProject

      public void initProject()
      initProject: this method is in charge of asking the user for the data of a project in order to register it and create the instance.

    • closeStage

      public void closeStage()
      This method closes a stage in a project by prompting the user to select the project and confirming the closure. If there are no projects registered in the system, an error message is displayed. The method retrieves the last project position from the controller, and then displays a list of projects for the user to choose from. Once a project is selected, the method calls the controller's "closeStageProject" method to confirm the closure of the stage.

    • registerCapsule

      public void registerCapsule()
      Registers a new capsule for a selected project and collaborator. Prompts the user for input to create the new capsule. Displays an error message if there are no projects registered or if the selected project has already been finalized.

    • approveCapsule

      public void approveCapsule()
      This method allows to approve a capsule. It shows the list of projects and capsules that are available for approval. Once a project and a capsule are selected, the method calls the controller to approve the capsule.

    • publicCapsule

      public void publicCapsule()
      This method allows to publish a registered capsule in a project. It shows a list of existing projects and a list of capsules registered in the selected project, and then calls the corresponding method in the controller to publish the selected capsule.

    • cleanScreen

      public void cleanScreen()
      Clean the screen

    • inputStagesDuration

      public int[] inputStagesDuration()
      This method asks the user for the duration in months of each stage of the project
      Returns:
      array whit duration in months per stage

    • showProjects

      public int showProjects(int lastProjectPosition)
      Show all the projects to choose
      Parameters:
      lastProjectPosition - last full position of a project, also is the projects size -1
      Returns:
      User's option

    • inputEmployees

      public int inputEmployees(String employeeRole, String[] employeeNames, int amountEmployees)
      Show all the employees, managers or collaborators to choose from and get user's input.
      Parameters:
      employeeRole - The role of the employees to be displayed.
      employeeNames - An array containing the names of the employees to be displayed.
      amountEmployees - The number of employees to be displayed.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected employee.

    • showCapsules

      public int showCapsules(int projectPosition, int capsulesStatus)
      Show all capsules under review, approved or published for a given project to choose from and get user's input.
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - The position of the project in the list of active projects.
      capsulesStatus - An integer representing the status of the capsules to be displayed. 0 for "Under Review", 1 for "Approved", 2 for "Published".
      Returns:
      The index of the selected capsule.
